mapper.select: SELECT mno, mid, mname, maddr, mbirth, mjoindate, memail, mphone, mgrade FROM members

SELECT from_user_id, to_user_id, bno, DATE_ADD(timestamp, INTERVAL -9 HOUR) as adjusted_timestamp, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DATE(DATE_ADD(timestamp, INTERVAL -9 HOUR)) ORDER BY timestamp) as total_count FROM tradehistory;
SELECT DISTINCT DATE(timestamp) AS dateOnly, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tradehistory th WHERE DATE(th.timestamp) = dateOnly) AS count FROM tradehistory;

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN rcate = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS category1, COUNT(CASE WHEN rcate = 2 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS category2, COUNT(CASE WHEN rcate = 3 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS category3, COUNT(CASE WHEN rcate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS category4, COUNT(CASE WHEN rcate = 5 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS category5 FROM report WHERE reportgrade = 1;

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory1, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 2 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory2, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 3 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory3, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory4, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 5 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory5, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory6, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory7, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory8, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory9, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory10, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory11, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory12, COUNT(CASE WHEN cate = 4 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS bcategory13
FROM board;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(timestamp, '%m-%d') AS monthDay, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tradehistory GROUP BY monthDay;
